issue.title: [CF 768] Reverse Cooldown Sweep/Desaturate Icon
issue.body:
Going to just make two suggestions in one so I don't make too many tickets.

1) Reverse the cooldown sweep so it'll "make more sense" based on what it's tracking.
2) Desaturate an icon, for something like an ability on cooldown or a trinket on ICD. Would be nice.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jastain | Imported from CurseForge issue #768 | Raw

comments.body:
Cooldown sweep is already reversed based on icon type.

Options for desaturation are available in TMW's color options (The option is named "Grey")


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
